description: Extended Git and GitHub commands bundle - advanced operations

commands.title: Git: Cherry-pick commit
commands.description: Apply a specific commit from another branch to current branch

commands.title: Git: Bisect start debugging
commands.description: Start binary search to find the commit that introduced a bug - bisect helps identify bad commits efficiently

commands.title: Git: Bisect mark current as good
commands.description: Mark current commit as good when using git bisect

commands.title: Git: Bisect mark current as bad
commands.description: Mark current commit as bad when using git bisect

commands.title: Git: Bisect reset
commands.description: End bisect session and return to original branch

commands.title: Git: View reference logs
commands.description: Show reference logs - useful to recover lost commits or find previous HEAD positions

commands.title: Git: Create lightweight tag
commands.description: Create a lightweight tag pointing to current commit

commands.title: Git: Create annotated tag
commands.description: Create annotated tag with message - includes tagger info and date

commands.title: Git: List all tags
commands.description: List all tags in repository

commands.title: Git: List tags with message
commands.description: List tags with first N lines of annotation message

commands.title: Git: Push tags to remote
commands.description: Push all tags to remote repository

commands.title: Git: Push single tag
commands.description: Push a specific tag to remote repository

commands.title: Git: Delete local tag
commands.description: Delete a tag from local repository

commands.title: Git: Delete remote tag
commands.description: Delete a tag from remote repository

commands.title: Git: Add remote
commands.description: Add a new remote repository

commands.title: Git: Remove remote
commands.description: Remove a remote repository from configuration

commands.title: Git: List remotes with URLs
commands.description: Show all configured remotes with their URLs

commands.title: Git: Change remote URL
commands.description: Update the URL for a remote repository

commands.title: Git: Show who changed what (blame)
commands.description: Show who last modified each line of a file - useful for understanding change history

commands.title: Git: Blame with date
commands.description: Show blame with author email and commit date

commands.title: Git: Clean untracked files
commands.description: Remove untracked files and directories from working directory - useful for cleanup

commands.title: Git: Clean untracked files (dry run)
commands.description: Preview what will be deleted without actually removing files

commands.title: Git: Create worktree
commands.description: Create a new worktree allowing multiple branches to be checked out simultaneously

commands.title: Git: List worktrees
commands.description: Show all linked working trees

commands.title: Git: Remove worktree
commands.description: Delete a linked working tree

commands.title: GitHub CLI: List pull requests
commands.description: List pull requests - state can be open, closed, or merged

commands.title: GitHub CLI: Create pull request
commands.description: Create a new pull request from command line

commands.title: GitHub CLI: List issues
commands.description: List issues - state can be open, closed, or all

commands.title: GitHub CLI: Create release
commands.description: Create a GitHub release with notes and assets

commands.title: GitHub CLI: View repository
commands.description: Display information about the repository
